Method Detail

loadNetwork

public boolean loadNetwork(AbstractExecution exe)
Loads from the data directory the already parsed graph file (which has the network's name). During the loading, updates the given AbstractExecution object.

Parameters:
exe -
Returns:
True if the load has been successful and False otherwise.

importNetwork

public boolean importNetwork(AbstractExecution exe,
                             java.lang.String filename_with_extension,
                             java.lang.String importedNet,
                             GraphInterface.GraphDataStructure graphDataStructure)

importNetwork

public boolean importNetwork(AbstractExecution exe,
                             java.lang.String filename_with_extension,
                             java.lang.String importedNet,
                             java.lang.String ext,
                             GraphInterface.GraphDataStructure graphDataStructure)
If the given file contents String is not null and not empty, then the contents are parsed into a graph. Otherwise, a file with the given name is loaded from the data directory and is parsed into a graph. During the loading, updates the given AbstractExecution object.

Parameters:
filename - - The name of the network file to parse.
importedNet - - The contents of the network file to parse.
Returns:
True if the import has been successful and False otherwise.

storeGraph

public boolean storeGraph()
Writes the graph to a file with the network's name and saves it into data directory.

Returns:
True if the storing has been successful and False otherwise.

getGraph

public AbstractGraph<javolution.util.Index> getGraph()
Returns:
the network's graph.

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Returns:
the network's name.
